title: Amaze Luxury
text:
Amaze Luxury offers bespoke concierge services across Monaco, Nice, and the French Riviera. The website needed to reflect the brand’s commitment to elegance, discretion, and personalized service.

I designed the website in Figma, focusing on a minimalist and sophisticated aesthetic.

Using Webflow, I developed a fully responsive and interactive site, with attention to smooth transitions, intuitive navigation, and performance optimization to deliver a polished and immersive user experience.

The website was co-designed with Uppercut Design

title: Idiokinisis
text:
Idiokinisis is a therapy and exercise clinic in Chalandri, focused on personalized neuromusculoskeletal rehabilitation and therapeutic movement.

I designed a clean and modern interface in Figma, with a neutral palette to create a calming feel, a structured layout for services and team info, and high-quality images to build trust. The design is fully responsive, offering a clear, accessible experience that reflects the clinic’s scientific and human-centered approach.

The website was co-designed with Uppercut Design

title: Paws & Tails
text:
Paws & Tails is a professional dog grooming business dedicated to providing high-quality grooming services tailored to the unique needs of each pet.

The design focuses on simplicity and warmth, with a fresh, modern look that matches the friendly vibe of Paws & Tails.

The goal was to create a site that’s easy to navigate, welcoming, and shows just how much the business cares for pets.

Designed in Figma and developed in Webflow

title: Massage Joy
text:
Massage Joy offers professional massage therapy focused on relaxation and wellness.

For the redesign, the goal was to create a calming, spa-like digital experience that makes service information and booking options clear and accessible.

Using Figma, I developed a soft, minimalist design with soothing colors and calming visuals to reflect the brand’s focus on rejuvenation. The layout is clean and intuitive, guiding users effortlessly through the site.

The website was co-designed with Uppercut Design

title: Uppercut
text:
January 2024 - Present
Freelance UI/UX Designer

I am involved in the design process of various websites, with my current projects focusing on the energy and environment sector.

I am responsible for creating user-friendly, visually appealing and effective websites that communicate key messages about renewable energy, environmental conservation, and sustainability.

title: Customedialabs
text:
July 2023 - April 2024
Web/Graphic Designer

I was involved in the design process of websites and applications. I also designed e-books, conducted UX audits and designed posts for social media platforms.

Through these activities, I helped create clear and engaging digital experiences that connect with users and support business goals.

title: P & A Papaioannou O.E
text:
P & A Papaioannou O.E. is a car service company that approached me to redesign their website with a more professional and modern look.

After conducting extensive research into the car service field and their target audience, I developed a fresh and modern design that perfectly fits their brand image. I used Figma for the design process and Wix for the development.

The new design effectively showcases their services and provides an exceptional user experience, helping them stand out in their industry.

title: Tasty Brands
text:
May 2023 - July 2023
Graphic Designer

Tasty Brands was a cloud kitchen company. During my time there, I edited numerous photos of food products to make them look appealing and appetizing. Additionally, I designed various assets for the company’s websites, ensuring a cohesive and attractive online presence.

Through these tasks, I helped make Tasty Brands' products look their best and supported the company's online marketing.
